# Summary

It's currently possible to throttle a publisher's update rate by setting the [SetMsgsPerSec](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/aeb86d615f4b50f2a2e09ec3e08c52ac1a9c5b09/include/ignition/transport/AdvertiseOptions.hh#lines-209) option. But the implementation is currently always using wall time. 

# Motivation

It would be useful to be able to throttle based on custom clocks, so a simulator could throttle based on the current simulation time, for example.

# Describe alternatives you've considered

Throttling from outside Ignition Transport, preventing the call to `Publish`.

# Additional context

The [Clock](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/src/default/include/ignition/transport/Clock.hh) class is being used to timestamp logs with custom time. The same class could be used for throttling.
